subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: By catching 11 passes for 154 yards Sunday night, Plaxico Burress, who has dealt with a severe right ankle sprain for most of the season, helped put the surprising Giants into Super Bowl XLII.
snippet: By catching 11 passes for 154 yards Sunday night, Plaxico Burress, who has dealt with a severe right ankle sprain for most of the season, helped put the surprising Giants into Super Bowl XLII.
